pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.8: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.11: “Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.2.1: Anāpucchite anāpucchitasaññā āsane nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.2.2: Anāpucchite vematikā āsane nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.2.3: Anāpucchite āpucchitasaññā āsane nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
